item.title: The Shunde Marriott Hotel has officially opened its doors in Foshan, China
item.description: Marriott International has expanded its presence in China with the opening of the 258-room Shunde Marriott Hotel. Located in Shunde, a district of Foshan in Guangdong Province, the hotel is owned by Shunde Midea Group and managed by Marriott under a long-term agreement. This latest addition brings the Marriott Hotels brand’s portfolio in Greater China to 19 properties. Source: Marriott. The Shunde Marriott offers guests views of either Shunfeng Mountain Park or the city skyline.
